column4: why does my screen mode not allow me to go higher than 800x600, i have 17" LCD which can go much higher!
the live CD lets me choose higher, its just the install doesnt
Ok, so it wont let you go higher in desktop properties yes?
I need to know what kinda hardware you are using
have you tried to install new nvidia drivers?
oh the nvidia drivers seem to only want to display things on my TV, and turn off the monitor by default
i think if you upgraded drivers it would fix your resolution drivers
Well, i gotta be honest, i dont know TOO much about nvidias in linux
its been years since i used one
i would say to check the ubuntu forums if you havent already
tis ok, ill figure out something, thanks for your time
